nodes.text: The T'Syriél were tall, muscular, bulldog-faced humanoids native to Shiva IV united into the Twelve Tribes of T'Syriél.

The T'Syriél reached peace with the neighboring Calians only after long years of war. The Galactic Empire recruited many traitorous T'Syriél to serve as stormtroopers in the Imperial invasion of Shiva IV. These T'Syriél stormtroopers kidnapped Leia Organa for Imperial General Sk'ar.
